title: Font ID needed - Please help!
content:
Hi all,

Hoping someone can identify this font:

[http://i6.photobucket.com/albums/y213/muttley1000/UniversalID-1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023162914/http:/i6.photobucket.com/albums/y213/muttley1000/UniversalID-1.jpg)

Any help would be very much apreciated!!

Many Thanks,  
- Grump

p.s. - Couldn’t get the image to show in here?

 [‹ Can anyone identify this typeface?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023162914/http:/typophile.com/node/43931 "Go to previous forum topic") [Font used in BT Shop catalogue ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023162914/http:/typophile.com/node/50371 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Grump

comments.content:
Niceee!!

Now where can I find myself a copy of this?!

Many thanks : )
